RPS:
To play type '!rps R/P/S'. You will wait until
another player will play the game 
To reset score type '!rps resetscores' 
To check score type '!rps scores'
SECRETCHAT: Secret Chat - deleting all messages if activated
To activate type '!secret chat (seconds before deletion)'
NEWS: To watch breaking news type '!news (region)', where region - ru/us/gb etc
